related_post.text: With a while loop you could pretty much do the equivalent of any recursive function couldn't you?

so_post.text: Anyway as to why you shouldn't this SO post sums that up nicely <https://stackoverflow.com/questions/3323001/whatisthemaximumrecursiondepthinpythonandhowtoincreaseit>
